name: T - Noah
_source: multi_add_portrait;Emma;Left;Noah;Right
speak;Noah; Excuse me, Emma. Can I talk to you for a second?
speak;Emma; Oh, sure. Is there something on your mind?
expression;Noah;Smile
speak;Noah; Haha, no, I save the confessions for church.
expression;Noah;NoSmile
speak;Noah; I wanted to say my thanks for saving us in the village.{w} My daughters are strong, but I can't help but worry about them.
speak;Emma; Well, it was my sister that charged in like a mad lass to save you guys.{w} I'm just happy that we were able to make it in time.
speak;Noah; We weren't totally defenseless, just taken off guard and had to scramble.{w} Since we drove them off thoroughly,{w} I had time to grab my special lance from my house before we left.
multi_remove_portrait;Emma;Noah
give_item;Emma;Holy_Lance
speak;Emma; Ooh, that does look cool{tgm}...
speak;Noah; You should find someone in your group to give it to,{w} put it to some good use.
speak;Emma; But, isn't this lance special to you?{w} It looks so fancy.

speak;Noah; Hah, well, my lance-wielding days might be behind me, I'm afraid.{w} It was made by a good friend of mine from back in the day{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Perhaps, one day, I could get him to forge some weapons for your family!{w} Your mother's blade looks quite dull,{w} and Emily's bow looks about ready to fall apart.
speak;Emma; That really won't be-

speak;Noah; No, you'll find that when my mind is made up, there's no changing it.{w} My time with a team taught me to repay those who help you in full,{w} no matter the cost.{w} It was something my hardass of a military instructor drilled into me{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Though, I guess in the long run, it left me with more good than bad.
speak;Emma; Oh, that's right, you fought in the war years ago, correct?
speak;Noah;Yes. Yes I did.

speak;Noah; I lost too many friends in those bloody days.{w} When it was all over, I had to ride out to the homes of every dead many in my division,{w} so I could break the bad news to their families.{w} Do you have any idea how harrowing it is to be seen as the undertaker on horseback?{w} To walk into town and feel the dread,{w} hear their whispers as wives and children begged for me not to knock upon their doors?
speak;Emma; I-I couldn't{tgm}...
speak;Noah;...;no_talk

speak;Noah; I'm sorry, Emma.{w} I would love to talk more on other topics, but{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I've got something to do real quick, a surprise for my daughter.{w} If you wanted to hear about old times,{w} maybe we could talk about it later.
speak;Noah; O-Okay.{w} See you later.
remove_portrait;Noah
speak;Emma;Oh, Noah...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
speak;Emma; I wish I knew how to heal you, but... These aren't the sorts of scars that healing magic can handle...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
